SEARCH
Package at.leisner.server.event

Schnittstelle Listener

public interface Listener
If you want to Listen at Event your class need to implement this interface You need for each Event a methode the name is irrelevant. This methode need the EventHandler annotation and one parameter a class that extend from Event e.g. 

 @EventHandler
 public void name(DisconnectEvent event) {
      System.out.println(event.getClient().getType())
 }
